name: Prolonged Service Codes
content: Description - Prolonged services related to both face-to-face and non-face-to-face is obligatory to be reimbursed the service providers. Healthcare professionals and clinical staff go above and beyond their timeline to provide gratifying services to their patients. Join the live session to augment your practice and its output. You will learn the full examination of accurate and correct coding and billing process, appropriate patient documentation. Rhonda Granja, our renowned speaker, will help you learn the techniques to protect your output cycle; expand your knowledge on codes as well as apt creating of your office time charts. Session Highlights: • Understanding prolonged services with and without direct patient contact • Place of service as it relates to Inpatient or observation setting • Understanding a Pre-operative clearance visit • Office Visit (45 minute Service) • Learn the appropriate usage of these codes • Recognize the relationship between prolonged services and telemedicine Who Should Attend? • Office staff • Coders and Billers • Administrators • RCM Team Members • Practitioners who can potentially bill these codes
